selection_criteria: Aligns with epochal themes (coherent growth, wisdom-informed, aligned networks)
Strengthens existing capabilities rather than fragments
Natural integration point with current constellation

candidate_worlds.name: Educational Intelligence World
candidate_worlds.purpose: Knowledge synthesis, learning systems, educational content generation
candidate_worlds.value_proposition: Amplifies wisdom application, creates educational assets
candidate_worlds.identity_fit: STRONG - Aligns with wisdom-informed action theme

candidate_worlds.name: Customer Engagement World
candidate_worlds.purpose: Customer interaction, support systems, relationship management
candidate_worlds.value_proposition: Deepens customer connections, improves service delivery

candidate_worlds.name: Research & Analytics World
candidate_worlds.purpose: Data analysis, market research, trend identification, insight generation

selection_recommendation: Expand to all 3 candidate worlds in phased approach
phasing_strategy: Launch Educational Intelligence first (knowledge foundation), then Research & Analytics (intelligence layer), then Customer Engagement (external interface)
